005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.binding.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.ITargetedConstraintBase;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032
033@SuppressWarnings({
034    "PMD.DataClass",
035    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
036})
037@MetaschemaAssembly(
038    formalName = "Targeted Index Constraint",
039    name = "targeted-index-constraint",
040    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
041public class TargetedIndexConstraint implements IBoundObject, ITargetedConstraintBase {
042  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
043
044  @BoundFlag(
045      formalName = "Constraint Identifier",
046      name = "id",
047      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
048  private String _id;
049
050  @BoundFlag(
051      formalName = "Constraint Severity Level",
052      name = "level",
053      defaultValue = "ERROR",
054      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
055      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, values = {
056          @AllowedValue(value = "CRITICAL",
057              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a serious fault in the content that will prevent typical use of the content."),
058          @AllowedValue(value = "ERROR",
059              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content. This may include issues around compatibility, integrity, consistency, etc."),
060          @AllowedValue(value = "WARNING",
061              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a potential issue with the content."),
062          @AllowedValue(value = "INFORMATIONAL",
063              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a point of interest."),
064          @AllowedValue(value = "DEBUG",
065              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content that may warrant review by a developer when performing model or tool development.") })))
066  private String _level;
067
068  @BoundFlag(
069      formalName = "Index Name",
070      name = "name",
071      required = true,
072      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
073  private String _name;
074
075  @BoundFlag(
076      formalName = "Constraint Target Metapath Expression",
077      name = "target",
078      required = true,
079      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
080  private String _target;
081
082  @BoundField(
083      formalName = "Formal Name",
084      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
085      useName = "formal-name")
086  private String _formalName;
087
088  @BoundField(
089      formalName = "Description",
090      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
091      useName = "description",
092      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
093  private MarkupLine _description;
094
095  @BoundAssembly(
096      formalName = "Property",
097      useName = "prop",
098      maxOccurs = -1,
099      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
100  private List<Property> _props;
101
102  @BoundAssembly(
103      formalName = "Key Constraint Field",
104      useName = "key-field",
105      minOccurs = 1,
106      maxOccurs = -1,
107      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "key-fields", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
108  private List<KeyConstraintField> _keyFields;
109
110  @BoundField(
111      formalName = "Remarks",
112      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
113      useName = "remarks")
114  private Remarks _remarks;
115
116  public TargetedIndexConstraint() {
117    this(null);
118  }
119
120  public TargetedIndexConstraint(IMetaschemaData data) {
121    this.__metaschemaData = data;
122  }
123
124  @Override
125  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
126    return __metaschemaData;
127  }
128
129  @Override
130  public String getId() {
131    return _id;
132  }
133
134  public void setId(String value) {
135    _id = value;
136  }
137
138  @Override
139  public String getLevel() {
140    return _level;
141  }
142
143  public void setLevel(String value) {
144    _level = value;
145  }
146
147  public String getName() {
148    return _name;
149  }
150
151  public void setName(String value) {
152    _name = value;
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  public String getTarget() {
157    return _target;
158  }
159
160  public void setTarget(String value) {
161    _target = value;
162  }
163
164  @Override
165  public String getFormalName() {
166    return _formalName;
167  }
168
169  public void setFormalName(String value) {
170    _formalName = value;
171  }
172
173  @Override
174  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
175    return _description;
176  }
177
178  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
179    _description = value;
180  }
181
182  @Override
183  public List<Property> getProps() {
184    return _props;
185  }
186
187  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
188    _props = value;
189  }
190
191  /**
192   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
193   *
194   * @param item
195   *          the item to add
196   * @return {@code true}
197   */
198  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
199    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
200    if (_props == null) {
201      _props = new LinkedList<>();
202    }
203    return _props.add(value);
204  }
205
206  /**
207   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
208   * collection.
209   *
210   * @param item
211   *          the item to remove
212   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
213   */
214  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
215    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
216    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
217  }
218
219  public List<KeyConstraintField> getKeyFields() {
220    return _keyFields;
221  }
222
223  public void setKeyFields(List<KeyConstraintField> value) {
224    _keyFields = value;
225  }
226
227  /**
228   * Add a new {@link KeyConstraintField} item to the underlying collection.
229   *
230   * @param item
231   *          the item to add
232   * @return {@code true}
233   */
234  public boolean addKeyField(KeyConstraintField item) {
235    KeyConstraintField value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
236    if (_keyFields == null) {
237      _keyFields = new LinkedList<>();
238    }
239    return _keyFields.add(value);
240  }
241
242  /**
243   * Remove the first matching {@link KeyConstraintField} item from the underlying
244   * collection.
245   *
246   * @param item
247   *          the item to remove
248   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
249   */
250  public boolean removeKeyField(KeyConstraintField item) {
251    KeyConstraintField value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
252    return _keyFields != null && _keyFields.remove(value);
253  }
254
255  @Override
256  public Remarks getRemarks() {
257    return _remarks;
258  }
259
260  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
261    _remarks = value;
262  }
263
264  @Override
265  public String toString() {
266    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
267  }
268}
